lead_paragraph: Dominik Hasek does not figure in the Ottawa Senators' plans next season after the team signed goalie Ray Emery to a one-year deal yesterday. Emery, 23, became the starter last season when Hasek, a six-time Vezina Trophy winner who is a free agent, sustained a season-ending groin injury.
